page.title: 12Abingworth Hall Hotel
page.content: Abingworth Hall Hotel is a luxury 3 star hotel. It is situated in eight acres and includes a large lake. It has twenty-one bedrooms and can accommodate forty people. The Hall was built in 1913. The first owner was Sir Oswald Mosley .In the 1950's it was extended and turned into a hotel.It has a swimming pool,a tennis court,pitch and putt and two helicopter pads.Nearby is a Golf Course.It quite often has conferences.Famous celebreties have stayed there.Eighteen staff are employed, some of whom live in.Pets are not allowed.It would cost about three hundred pounds a week for half board.At present it is owned by Mr. and Mrs. Bulman.
